title: OneNutS
author: OneNutS
created_time: June 25, 2022, 09:05:26 AMLast edit: July 11, 2022, 10:14:30 AM by OneNutS
content: ⚠️ Attention ⚠️ ‼️ Due to the fact that the project team Hippoinu a long time does not get in touch and do not provide feedback. We have decided to Pause the Bounty Campaign ‼️📌 If we get feedback from the Hippoinu project team and they send us a pool of tokens on escrow (as they promised earlier) we will continue this Bounty Campaign according to the rules and deadlines 🤝🧞.SOCIALS.                                                                                                       Our core goal is to provide superior execution trading at the heart of Binance Brilliant Chain. Our accomplices and groups adapt our means to provide our local top-notch support individuals. The Hippo breed is a large, lonely family with a steadily growing series of occasions. Our network guarantees high security reviews to our local individuals through outsiders. We allocated 50% to liquidity and pre-sale, 12% to provide liquidity to CEX exchange, and 30% to reward pool (staking). We also locked up team, strategic partnerships and marketing/advisory tokens on PinkSale More details on the website: https://hippoinu.io    ● Bounty Campaign Round 1 Dates: June 25 - July 22  lasts for 4 weeks.● Tokens will be distributed to participants within 1 week  after the end of the Bounty Campaign.● Daily stakes! Do tasks every day and make reports every day ! ( at least every 3 days )● Tokens will be distributed to participants  July 28 in the   BSC (bep 20) address.● Join Hippoinu on social media:- Telegram Channel- Telegram Chat- Twitter- Medium                                                                       ● You will receive stakes for performing certain actions, after the end of the bounty campaign, the stakes will be converted into tokens, according to the formula (total number of tokens/total number of stakes)*number of your stakes.● Please read the terms and conditions carefully. For non-compliance, even minor, you will not receive stakes or will be excluded from the bounty program.● Use of multi-accounts, spam, bots and other is strictly forbidden, all attempts will be banned.● Bounty managers reserve the right to change the conditions of the bounty campaign.Follow all updates in this thread and Telegram chats: Hippoinu Chat, Hippoinu Bounty, Aladdin Center●  Make reports every day ! ( at least every 3 days ) DO NOT QUOTE YOUR OLD REPORT🙏!●  Format for proof of authentication post:Code: Proof of authentication:- Email:- BSC (bep 20) address:- Telegram Username:- Campaigns applied for: Bounty campaign reward pool: $15 000 worth $Hippo tokens will be distributed through this bounty campaign. Rewards dislocation:● Video: 20%● Medium: 15%● Twitter : 20%● Telegram: 20%● Signature: 15%● Reserve fund - 10%Rewards:● Excellent: 4 stakes (High quality video and >4000 subscribers)● High: 3 stakes (Good quality video and >2000 subscribers )● Good: 2 stake (Average quality video and >1000 subscribers)● Average: 1 stake (Average quality video and >400 subscribers)Rules:● Join Hippoinu on social media:- Telegram Channel- Telegram Chat- Twitter- Medium● Each participant can send:                                             - YouTube - 4 videos ( No more than 1 video a week )                                            - Tiktok - 4 videos ( No more than 1 video a week )● Participant's account should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the video campaign and have at least 300 subscribers.● The video description must include 70+ words of original text about the company Hippoinu● Content topics:1) Whitelist is open - Public presale will be live on 26th on pinksale: https://hippoinu.io/whitelist2) This is first meme token which is giving 2% reward in BUSD on every buy/sell trx.3) Also, its very first memes token aggregator which means holders will also get reward in other memes tokens (under development)4) Hippo token holders can stake their hippo tokens and reward will be in shiba, babydoge, doge tokens as well its live as you can see here:5) lastly, community can create their own meme tokens and initiate presale here: https://create.hippoinu.io/Information can be used from social networks Hippoinu and use hashtags: #hippoinu #Hippo #HippoInu #memetokens #memecoin #memereward #bnb #staking #RFI● Only original video content will be accepted. Copy from the project website, YouTube channels or from others' work will be rejected.● Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered.● High engagements but poor quality video will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality.● Videos should never be removed. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.● All videos need to have a link to the Proof of Authentication, project's website, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel or any other social media.● Please provide enough details of the producer (bounty hunter) at the end of the video to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!● By joining this program, all participants accept that the project's team can use all these videos as marketing materials.● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the   Hippoinu Bounty, Aladdin CenterHow to join:1.  Join Hippoinu on social media:- Telegram Channel- Telegram Chat- Twitter- Medium3. Write a good video about Hippoinu project4. Post it on your website, Tiktok, YouTube5. Submit it here:  Rewards:● Original article: 5 - 10 stakes, per participant in the campaign: Once every 3 days - max 2 articles per week ( 10 per campaign )● 1 comment - 1 steak (2 per day at most)(DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT)You can use social media for information: - Telegram Channel- Telegram Chat- Twitter- MediumRules:● Follow the Medium( Don't forget to clap)● DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT !● Comments for the Medium campaign are required to be published on high-ranking pages and under articles that have a large number of likes and comments  Example page:● Your account on Medium must be at least 1 month old and original. Fake, dead, inactive and bot accounts are not accepted.                     ● You must be an active and regular Medium user.   ● The account must be open as a public profile.● Create Hippoinu article in your profile. You can use social media for simplicity: - Telegram Channel- Telegram Chat- Twitter- Medium● Content topics: 1) Whitelist is open - Public presale will be live on 26th on pinksale: https://hippoinu.io/whitelist2) This is first meme token which is giving 2% reward in BUSD on every buy/sell trx.3) Also, its very first memes token aggregator which means holders will also get reward in other memes tokens (under development)4) Hippo token holders can stake their hippo tokens and reward will be in shiba, babydoge, doge tokens as well its live as you can see here:5) lastly, community can create their own meme tokens and initiate presale here: https://create.hippoinu.io/● “Applause” and Bookmark our Medium Press release● Write one comment every day about the project on other famous pages (2 per day at most) (DO NOT SPAM ON OFFICIAL PROJECT PAGES)● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the   Hippoinu Bounty, Aladdin CenterHow to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2.Make reports every day ! ( at least every 3 days ) using this format:Code:● Medium Report ●- Day: XX- Medium Profile:- Link to the article (if there is one)- Comment Link #1:- Comment Link #2:Rewards:● 300 to 1000 readers: 1 stake, per one tweet or retweet● 1001 to 3000 readers: 2 stakes, per one tweet or retweet● 3001 - 6000 readers: 3 stakes, per one tweet or retweet● 6001 - 12000 readers: 4 stakes per one tweet or retweet● 12000+ readers: 5 stakes per one tweet or retweetRules:●  Must have at least 300 followers and make privacy settings open for your page.●  Follow and like the official  Twitter● Make 1 post every day. Use information from official social networks. Your posts should have hashtags: #hippoinu #Hippo #HippoInu #memetokens #memecoin #memereward #bnb #staking #RFI● Make 1 repost every day . Like a post when you make a repost. Use information from official social networks. Your posts should have hashtags: #hippoinu #Hippo #HippoInu #memetokens #memecoin #memereward #bnb #staking #RFI● DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT ! ●  Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked and deleted● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the   Hippoinu Bounty, Aladdin Center●  Please, post all the links to your work in this thread every day or every 3 days as a new post. Do not quote or edit your previous report.How to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2.Make reports every day ! ( at least every 3 days ) using this format:Code:● Twitter Report ●- Day: XX- Twitter Profile:- Retweet Link #1....- Tweet Link#1....Rewards:● 1 comment = 1 stakes.● 20 stakes for setting name and avatar(one time stake)Rules:● Join  - Telegram Channel- Telegram Chat● Make a maximum 5 comments per 1 day● DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT !● Write comments in a crypto related group, mentioning the Hippoinu Write comments on groups from this  listContinue the comment of the previous person. Your commentshould flow into the dialogue and continue the person’s thought. Comment examples:- Did you hear about the  Hippoinu ?- Is the Hippoinu  good for buying now??- Is the Hippoinu  powered by ETH or its own blockchain?- guys, what do you think about the  Hippoinu ?- Hippoinu  looks good now, it's not pumped yet!etc…● It is forbidden to make meaningless and unconscious comments, spam. Comments like: Hi!, Hello!, Good project - will not be counted. Don't spam all comments in a row, don’t write  silly phrases! Spam and low quality will not be counted.● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the   Hippoinu Bounty, Aladdin Center● Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked and deleted.Name: Your name | Hippoinu Ambassador.Avatar: How to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2. Make reports every day ! ( at least every 3 days ) using this format:Code: ● Telegram Report ●- Day:- Username link: (Example: https://t.me/username)- Telegram comments:- Comment Link #1:- Comment Link #2:- Comment Link #3:- Comment Link #4:- Comment Link #5:..:Rewards:Hero/Legendary - 5 stakesSenior Member - 4 stakesFull Member - 3 stakesMember/Copper - 2 stakesJr. Member - 1 stakeRules:● Join Hippoinu on social media:- Telegram Channel- Telegram Chat- Twitter- Medium● Use the official Hippoinu Avatar and Signatures provided below.● If you rank up, you must change your signature and notify us by posting in a bounty thread or by Private Message.● Spamming, duplicate and low-quality posts is strictly prohibited and will not be counted.● A post must be on topic and constructive with a minimum of 80 characters per post.● Minimum post per week should be 10 to be eligible in receiving your weekly stakes.● You are not allowed to drop signatures or advertise other sites in your signatures.● Posts should be spread across the week, if you post all 10 in 1-2 days you will receive 0 stakes.● Registrations with multiple accounts are forbidden and lead to a permanent ban with no reward.● Posts in Politics & Society, Games and Rounds, Off-Topic, Archival, Local, bounty threads will not be counted.● Negative trust will not be accepted.● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the   Hippoinu Bounty, Aladdin CenterHow to join:1. Join Hippoinu on social media:- Telegram Channel- Telegram Chat- Twitter- Medium2. Wear the signature and avatar provided below based on your rank.3. Make weekly report in this thread using this format:Code:Week#:Signature Report:1. Link on posts 1:2. Link on posts 2:3. Link on posts 3:....10. Link on posts 10:    Avatar:     Link    Signatures:  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5404003.msg60437597#msg60437597* BOUNTY CAMPAIGN paid by the project team Hippo Inu
